Dave Parrish - seo http://webpagedeveloper.me/taxonomy/term/11/0 en Site SEO and the many Drupal modules http://webpagedeveloper.me/blog/site-seo-and-many-drupal-modules <!-- google_ad_section_start --><p>I have finally gotten around to installing all of the modules for Drupal SEO on this site. I always follow the SEO checklist when setting up SEO for customers and my own sites. I have realized in setting up the SEO modules that I use a TON of modules! I thought it would be fun to list out all of the modules used for this simple portfolio and blog site. Here goes:</p> <p>Account Menu<br /> Administration menu<br /> Backup and Migrate<br /> CCK<br /> Contemplate<br /> Date<br /> File Field<br /> Global Redirect<br /> Google Analytics<br /> Image API<br /> Image Cache<br /> Image Field<br /> Inline<br /> jQuery UI<br /> Link<br /> Mollom<br /> Page Title<br /> Pathauto</p> <!-- google_ad_section_end --><p><a href="http://webpagedeveloper.me/blog/site-seo-and-many-drupal-modules" target="_blank">read more</a></p> http://webpagedeveloper.me/blog/site-seo-and-many-drupal-modules#comments drupal modules seo Sun, 25 Apr 2010 01:55:58 +0000 David 25 at http://webpagedeveloper.me
